item.title: 4.85 CFW & PS3HEN (Homebrew / Tools / CFW Releases / PS3HEN Updates)
item.author: invalid@example.com (STLcardsWS)
item.dc:creator: STLcardsWS
item.content:encoded:
When a firmware update arises like 4.85, there are some things that require updates, this thread attempts to track anything related to the 4.85 Update / updated tools / homebrew/ CFW releases / PS3HEN (4.85) Updates and more.. Keep bookmarked and checkback often. Found something we have not added. Simple give myself an alert by typing as follows >>> " @STLcardsWS "​

item.title: [Research]PS2 emulator configuration on PS4
item.author: invalid@example.com (kozarovv)
item.dc:creator: kozarovv
item.content:encoded:
Ps2 emulation on PS4 is handled in very different way comparing to PS3. Emulator seems to be more open for configurations. We can basically change anything we want. Here comes kudos to developers, as many of this options are here to bring you 1:1 emulation. They implemented settings that can change almost everything in way how game is recompiled. Thread, and first post are constantly updated with knowledge that I'm gaining right now.

1. Custom...

[Research]PS2 emulator configuration on PS4

item.title: PS2 Slim Internal HDD
item.author: invalid@example.com (ISAK.M)
item.dc:creator: ISAK.M
item.content:encoded:
Nowadays I have switched from being into PS3 stuff to being into PS2, where my interest in console modding and exploiting stuff began.
Whatever, my question is... Is it possible to connect a 2.5" HDD to a PS2 Slim?
I cant find any tutorials or anything, just a few threads on other forums. I have found out that there is two things called HD ComBo and HD Connect. Is it possible to connect without those? I managed to find info on that aswell and I read in 1 thread that you had to solder 39!!...

PS2 Slim Internal HDD

item.title: Quick question about updating from HFW 4.84.2 to HFW 4.85.2
item.author: invalid@example.com (mig-slzr)
item.dc:creator: mig-slzr
item.content:encoded:
Hey,
So I am currently running my super slim ps3 on HFW 4.84.2 and I'm willing to get on 4.85.1, to play on MGSV:TPP online and Sniper Elite 3 DLC's.
If I do the update, will I still keep multiman, HEN Enabler and all the jailbreak related stuff I have, such as games, homebrews or will I have to redo it all? If I have to do it all again I'll stay on my current firmware.

Thank you in advance
Mig

item.title: I'm being driven insane... (OPL with HDD)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Deli295)
item.dc:creator: Deli295
item.content:encoded:
Hi, so I just got my 3rd party adapter for my PS2 (SCPH-5006), I also got component cables and plugged and set up a 500gb drive with my backups. But there's a very annoying problem with most games: they don't play correctly, and every few frames (whenever it wants really) the game decides to stutter. I thought this could only happen when playing from USB and in cutscenes, but in my case it happens during gameplay too, making gaming pretty much unplayable. Hope anyone can help, thanks from...

I'm being driven insane... (OPL with HDD)

item.title: (SOLVED) Downgrading from 4.85 to 4.84
item.author: invalid@example.com (PolybiusOfficial)
item.dc:creator: PolybiusOfficial
item.content:encoded:
Hi. I have a flashed 4.85 CFW Overflow console.

I have Toggle QA Flag.

And I have selected to downgrade REBUG 4.84.2 REX.

And then, when all finished...

--

I have downgraded to 4.65 OFW.
I have downloaded REBUG from official website (rebug.me)

--

What happened?

item.title: PS3 PRO MOD Release/Information Thread
item.author: invalid@example.com (kozarovv)
item.dc:creator: kozarovv
item.content:encoded:
PS3 PRO MOD by LuanTeles

View attachment 9625 ​

Installation:

Mount the dev_blind using FTP or Multiman
1) Transfer the all the PS3 PRO files to its respective folders dev_blind for the Modded system files
and dev_hdd0 files (Theme,* Packages, *Custom RetroArch, PSP Launcher, PKG Launcher, Multiman Icons)
2) Only For PT-BR Users copy the content inside the Folder PT-BR for (XMBM+ 2K17 PT-BR + WebMan...

PS3 PRO MOD Release/Information Thread

item.title: help > get *more* current status using web ?
item.author: invalid@example.com (zosky)
item.dc:creator: zosky
item.content:encoded:
recently got a CFW capable slim and it's been fun. thanks for all the TUTs... now i'm stuck making this thing play nice with our smartHome.

i see a lot of useful endpoints in webManMod's pages, like mounting, unmount & playing. i can also poll for the current disk by trying "http://myPS3/dev_bdvd/PS3_GAME/ICON0.PNG" ... timeout = system off / 404 = no disk

where i need some advice please.
- how to find the current user & switching to another profile
-...

help > get *more* current status using web ?

Handle execution history.
Dump console IDs.
Save and restore WLAN settings.

item.title: PS3 hard crashes randomly while playing PS2 games.
item.author: invalid@example.com (MikeZorD)
item.dc:creator: MikeZorD
item.content:encoded:
Hello, I'm new here and to the ps3 jailbreak scene. As I've only recently did it to my ps3 just this summer.

Well I will disclose that my ps3 has a problem with booting, as it sometimes shuts down when I try to boot, giving me 3 beeps and a blinking red light, even before the blue light from the blue ray reader comes up. I just force myself through it until it gives in and boots normaly. I've tried most things to try and fix this problem but to no avail, probably would have to replace the...

PS3 hard crashes randomly while playing PS2 games.
